div.p: Read this important letter about the Rains ISD school closure.
Visit the Rains ISD at-home learning site for free online resources.
Get the latest information for RHS students, such as GPA's, choice sheets, and testing, so you can work toward your college, career, and military goals.
People's Telephone is providing public WiFi access outside the west end of the Rains Junior High building. You may sit in your car and utilize this access FOR FREE.
